back.title: Turn cards in appropriate date and join to our celebration!
Welcome to Advent Calendar 2024!
back.description: Get ready to spark some holiday spirit with our Advent Calendar!

modal.title: Welcome to
modal.subtitle: Advent Calendar 2024!
modal.description:
Get ready to spark some holiday spirit with our Advent Calendar!

From December 1st to 24th, we've lined up a daily dose of fun activities designed to bring us all together. Expect everything from festive crafts to tasty treats.

It's more than just a countdown to Christmas—it's a chance to have so much fun and create some new memories. Join in the fun and let’s make this December one to remember!

modal.title: Activity of the Day
modal.subtitle: Gratitude Wall
modal.description:
🎈"As the year draws near its fall,
Let's send thanks to one and all!
For support and laughter through and through,
Here’s something special you can do!"

As the year comes to a close, take a moment and show appreciation for the people who brought joy and cheer into our lives.

🌐 Online Action: Visit our HERO's portal and give a badge of honor to those who have made a difference within 2024 for you. Recognize their help, contribution into your development and let them know how much they are valued.

🏢 In the Office: Join us at our physical gratitude wall. Pick up a sticker and express your thanks creatively. Post a badge on the wall to publicly acknowledge your workplace heroes and their outstanding contributions.

modal.title: St. Nicholas Day
modal.subtitle: Treats Time
modal.description:
🎄 "St. Nick's marching near,
with glee and with cheer,
Prepare treats galore,
goodies to adore!"

St. Nicholas Day is approaching, and it's a perfect occasion to enjoy some festive treats!

🏠 At Home: Time to get busy in the kitchen! Pull out your baking tools and ingredients, and start crafting your favorite holiday sweets. Whether it’s cookies, fudge, or peppermint sticks, whip up something special for the celebration.

🏢 In the Office: Bring your children dressed in their festive best and join us at the office for a fun-filled celebration. We’ll have treats, stories, and lots of festive fun. St. Nicholas Day is always a hit when we gather together!

modal.title: Paint Time
modal.subtitle: Let's paint!
modal.description:
🎨"Grab your brushes,
splash some hues,
today we paint with no excuse!"

It's time to unleash your creativity! No experience is needed, just a willingness to try. Grab some paints or drawing materials and let your festive spirit guide your art.

🖌️ At Home or In the Office: Don’t worry if you’re not an artist. Just pick up some painting or drawing tools and give it a shot! This fun contest is all about creativity and enjoying the process.

🎨 Office Exhibition: In the office we will have some supplies. So get together within a time slot provided for this activity and let's paint together! Put your masterpiece on a wall, creating a festive gallery that everyone can enjoy.

👩‍🎨 Online Submission & Voting: Submit a photo of your artwork to our special Teams thread. Everyone will have a chance to vote for their favorite piece. The entry with the most votes will win a unique Christmas bauble!

Voting Lasts Until: December 12th

modal.title: Warm Hearts
modal.subtitle: International Volunteer Day
modal.description:
🌟 "Give a little,
Help a lot,
Let’s warm hearts
With what we've got!"

Today is an International Volunteer Day. Also, Christmas season is a perfect time to show our generosity and make a positive impact. Choose a cause that resonates with you and contribute what you can. Every bit of help counts and brings joy not only to those in need but also to ourselves.

💖 Online & Office Participation: Select a charity of your choice. Making a donation is easy and can be done online.

modal.title: Photo Contest
modal.subtitle: Snowflakes from Childhood
modal.description:
❄️ "Remember when winter
was a wonderland?
Bring it back,
with a snip of the hand!"

Revisit the chilly, joyful days of your childhood by creating your own paper snowflakes. Each cut and fold can bring back cherished memories. Make your unique snowflake designs using simple materials like paper and scissors.

🏠 At Home: Grab some paper and scissors and craft your snowflakes. When you're done, take a picture of your creations and share it with us in our chat. Let's see how many unique and memorable designs we can gather!

🏢 In the Office: Join us in the office for a group snowflake-making session. Use your snowflakes to decorate your workspace or take them home for a personal touch. Let’s fill our office with these symbols of winter and nostalgia.

modal.title: Happy Saturday!
modal.subtitle: Take a rest and enjoy the weekend!
modal.description: Thank you so much for joining in on our Advent Calendar activities this week! We hope you've enjoyed the festive tasks! Have a wonderful weekend, rest up, and get ready for another exciting week of holiday cheer starting Monday!

modal.title: Spoiler
modal.subtitle: ALERT!
modal.description:
Tomorrow our week of activities starts again and there will be something about music, something about decoration, something about making magic with your own hands ⁠;)

Stay tuned...

modal.title: Jingle Bells...
modal.subtitle: ...sounds everywhere
modal.description:
🎵 "Spin the records,
jingle the bells,
let’s rewind
to when Christmas dwells!"

Reflect on the holiday music of your childhood, the songs that filled your home as you decorated for the season. Whether they were joyful carols or soothing melodies, we want you to share those special tunes with us.

🎤 Online Contribution: We’ve created a YouTube playlist for everyone to contribute their favorite holiday songs. Add the music that brings back fond memories of past celebrations, and let's all enjoy a diverse holiday soundtrack.

🏢 In the Office: Listen as these shared melodies play in our common areas. The nostalgic tunes will bring smiles and maybe even some sing-alongs. Let’s fill our workspace with the joyful sounds of our collective holiday histories.

modal.title: Story time
modal.subtitle: Share your family's holiday traditions
modal.description:
🌟 "Tales of Yule,
tales so bright,
share yours
in the festive light!"

Winter signals a time of warmth and cherished traditions. Each family has its own unique customs that light up the festive season. Today, we invite you to share the traditions and stories that mean the most to you.

📝 Online Sharing: Join us in our MS Teams channel to share your family's holiday traditions. It's a wonderful opportunity to learn more about each other and discover the diverse ways we celebrate.

modal.title: Activity of the Day
modal.subtitle: Advent Wreath Making DIY
modal.description:
🌿 "Twist and twine
your festive flair, 
create a wreath 
beyond compare!"

🏠 At Home: use materials you have at hand to create a wreath that not only brings holiday spirit to your space but could also be a contender in tomorrow’s desk decoration contest!

🏢 In the Office: Join us in the office to create your own festive advent wreath. We'll provide all the materials you need; you bring your creativity! Craft your wreath using sprigs, bows, and other decorations to make a circle of joy that celebrates tradition.

🍃 Preview of Tomorrow: Don’t forget to take your wreath with you after making it. You can use it to decorate your desk for tomorrow’s contest. It’s a great way to bring some holiday spirit to your workspace and you might even win a prize for your efforts!

modal.title: Contest
modal.subtitle: Desk Decoration
modal.description:
🎁 "Deck the desks
with boughs and holly,
let’s make
the office jolly!"

Now that your wreath is ready, it's time to transform your desk. Whether you're at home or in the office, decorate your desk to impress and compete in our festive contest.

📸 Online Submission & Contest Details: Dress up your desk with holiday decorations and capture the festive look with a photo. Share your setup with us through a submission.

Get creative and make your workspace shine! The desk that displays the most holiday spirit and creativity will win a special prize.

Contest Closes: December 20th

modal.title: Gathering
modal.subtitle: Office Christmas Party
modal.description:
🎉 "Cap off the season
with flair and fun,
our Christmas party
has begun!"

Let’s Celebrate Together: Our Christmas party is the perfect time to unwind, have some fun, and enjoy the company of your colleagues. We look forward to seeing everyone there and celebrating our accomplishments and festive spirit together!

modal.title: Season’s Greetings
modal.subtitle: for the Weekend!
modal.description: As we pause our Advent fun for the weekend, we want to extend a huge thank you for your enthusiastic participation! Enjoy your weekend, recharge, and let’s gear up for more festive activities and surprises in the coming week. Stay cozy and have a great Saturday and Sunday!

modal.title: Spoiler
modal.subtitle: ALERT!
modal.description: Hope you love our advent calendar as much as we do. We can't wait for them to start again! You should anticipate something ugly, something beautiful and something visual.

modal.title: Activity of the Day
modal.subtitle: Postcards From Croatia
modal.description:
🎉 "From rolling hills
to city lights,
let’s craft scenes
of Croatian nights!"

Express the beauty of Croatia this festive season by using your artistic skills to produce an enchanting postcard. Be it the breathtaking landscapes or colorful Christmas markets, your creation will reflect a piece of Croatian charm.

📸 Participation Details: Choose a Croatian scene you find inspiring or a festive setting that captures the holiday spirit. Feel free to use any artistic medium, such as watercolors, colored pencils, or digital tools, to create your postcard.

Prize Information: Once your postcard is ready, submit it for a chance to win a unique Christmas bauble. This distinctive prize will bring a touch of Croatian flair to your holiday decorations.
Let your artistic flair celebrate Croatian beauty and holiday cheer, and may the best postcard win!

Contest is open until December 20th

modal.title: Activity of the Day
modal.subtitle: Holiday Photo
modal.description:
📸 "Deck the halls 
and light the lights, 
let’s fill our homes
with festive sights!"

It's time to showcase your holiday spirit! Decorate your space with festive flair, whether it's stringing up lights, hanging garlands, or setting up a majestic Christmas tree. Get creative and transform your home into a holiday wonderland.

🏠 Create Your Festive Mood: Decorate your home with all things merry and bright. Whether it’s a twinkling display or a beautifully adorned tree, let your space reflect the joy of the season. Capture this festive setting with a photo to share your holiday spirit.

🌟 Share Your Sparkle: Post your holiday photo on our channel, where everyone can see your festive decorations. Whether it’s a cozy nook or a grand display, let’s spread the holiday cheer together and enjoy the beautiful scenes created by our community.

modal.title: Activity of the Day
modal.subtitle: Holiday Movies Vote
modal.description:
"Lights, Camera, Action!
Let’s roll the holiday attraction!"

As the nights draw in and the temperatures drop, It’s perfect for a movie, popcorn non-stop. We’ve gathered classics and new delights, For magical cinematic pre-holiday nights.

🌟 Vote for Your Favorite Film: Browse your Christmas movie list, take your pick, share with everyone in a dedicated channel. And then vote for the best movies out of those shared by others!

🏢 In the Office: Join us on December 20 for a mini screening, we'll showcase a film that’s worth seeing.

🍿 Let’s Make Movie Magic Together: Cast your vote, then watch and chat, Discuss scenes that stood out. Your vote helps pick the top festive film!

back.title: Contest
back.description: My Ugly Sweater is THE BEST!

modal.title: Activity of the Day
modal.subtitle: Ugly Sweater Contest
modal.description:
"Deck yourself
in the gaudiest threads,
where festive meets
'fashion' spreads!"

It’s time to dig deep into your wardrobe for the most outrageous and eye-catching sweaters you own. The more bells, pom-poms, and wild patterns, the better. Let’s celebrate this fun tradition with enthusiasm and humor!

📸 Share and Inspire: Take a look at previous years' photos to get inspired, then take a bold step and share a photo of yourself in your most flamboyant holiday sweater. Post your picture in our chat and join in the festive fun!

🏢 In the Office: Wear your most outrageous sweater to the office tomorrow. Show off your wildest, most festive knits. We’ll see who manages to create the most astonishingly hilarious sweater. Prizes are in store for the most memorable entries!

🏆 Prize Alert: Stand out in your ugly sweater creation, Win a custom Lego bauble—a festive sensation!

Contest is open until December 20th

modal.title: Activity of the Day
modal.subtitle: Holiday Movie Night
modal.description:
"Cue the popcorn, dim the lights,
join us for a movie night!"

The results from our holiday movie poll are in, and we've chosen the perfect film to enjoy together. Gather round for a night of cinematic cheer and feel-good moments as we watch the community's top pick.

🍿 In the Office: Join us for a magical evening in the office as we dive into our selected film. Comfy seating and good company await. Don't forget to bring your favorite snacks!

🕖 Time: see a placeholder in your calendar.

🎥 Let's Enjoy Together: Enjoy a mix of laughs, thrills, and heartfelt storytelling. It's the perfect way to unwind and connect with your colleagues after a busy day.

modal.title: Cheers
modal.subtitle: to a Festive Weekend!
modal.description: Another week of our Advent Calendar activities is in the books—thanks for being a part of it! We hope it added a little extra joy to your week. Take time to relax this weekend, and we look forward to seeing your smiling faces and holiday spirit as we dive into the last 2 days of the Advent Calendar fun starting Monday!

modal.title: Christmas is coming...
modal.subtitle: Let's get ready!
modal.description: Soon we will gather together with friends and family and celebrate but before that let's finalize our Advent adventure with something meaningful. See you Monday!

modal.title: Activity of the Day
modal.subtitle: Prophecy Orbs
modal.description:
"Discover Your Fortune: Decorate with Prophecy Orbs"

As the year comes to a close, let's embrace a unique tradition. Join us in setting up a special corner filled with prophecy orbs.

🏠  At home: go to DIAL and use the given prompt to get your unique prophesy for the upcoming year. Prompt: 2024 year is coming to a close and 2025 is near. be my personal prophet and make a prediction of what awaits me in the future in 2025.

🏢 In the office: at the entrance to the office find an orb with prophesies inside. Close your eyes, pick a random one and enjoy the unique prophesy for the upcoming year! It’s a fun, intriguing way to engage with a beautiful tradition and perhaps discover some insightful predictions for the coming year.

modal.title: Today’s Call to Action
modal.subtitle: Create a Wish
modal.description:
As the current year comes to a close and we look forward to the New Year, it’s an ideal time for introspection and goal setting. Reflect on your desires and what you aim to achieve in the upcoming year.

📓 How to Participate: Carve out a quiet moment in your day to reflect. Sit down, think about what truly matters to you, and decide on your biggest goal for 2025. Jot it down in your notebook and start turning your dream into an actionable plan.

🌈 "Dream Big: Craft Your Wish for 2025"
